channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Tom Quinn (astrophysicist)
item.description: Tom Quinn is a professor in the Department of Astronomy at the University of Washington (UW) in Seattle. He is the leader of the N-Body Shop, a faculty member of the astrobiology program at UW, and an affiliate member at the eScience Institute. He assisted in generating the cosmological simulation code called ChaNGA.
